login.side_info:
The DCC template aims to unify efforts and standardize the way we implement our products in ELM.
          It can reduce efforts related to common project activities like project structure, technology stack, error handling strategy, coding standards, ...
          In our last survey, effort saved can go up to 20% of the total project effort.

privacy-policy.privacy_text:
• If you use "Hajj App" for which you provide us with personally identifiable data, we may share necessary data with other Government agencies, so as to serve you in a most efficient and effective way. We will not share your personal data with non-Governmental entities, except where such entities have been authorized to do so competent authorities. By submitting your personal information and data through the "Hajj App" you fully agree on the storage, process and use by the Saudi authorities. We reserve the right at all times to disclose any information to the competent authorities as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation or governmental request.
  • You are solely responsible for the comprehensiveness, correctness and truthfulness of the data you send on this Platform.
  • To safeguard your personal data, all electronic storage and transmission of personal data are secured with appropriate security technologies.
  • This Platform may contain links to sites or portals whose data protection and privacy practices may differ from ours. We are not responsible for the content and privacy practices of these other websites and advise you to consult the privacy notices of those sites.
  • When you use "Hajj App" services, we collect and process your actual location information We use different technologies to determine location, including IP Address and GPS. Your location data is stored securely and is not shared with any 3rd parties
  • When we have location information, we use it to tailor our services to help you and other Pilgrims with Guidance to important locations such as your Accommodation (Tent/Tower), locate missing Pilgrims, facilitate all Pilgrims by identifying potential crowd congestions in ritual places like Mina, Arafat, Muzdalifah and Holy Mosque..
